item.description:
Hello ASL Enthusiasts!

WHEN: Monday  
TIME: 8:00-10:00PM
WHO: BEGINNERS and those who would like to help out with beginners!
WHY: To socialize, have fun, and enjoy chatting in ASL
WHERE: Tavern In the Square in Porter Square!

To get to the Meetup, take the RED LINE stop OUTBOUND TO ALEWIFE, and stop at PORTER SQ. As you come out of the T, turn left on Mass Ave. and you'll see Tavern on the Square left hand side of the street. 

Hello beginners! We haven't had a Meetup just for beginners in a long time. Please come if you have been "meaning to" come to a Meetup but felt intimidated or worried because you're just starting and you're not sure how far a conversation can go. We will have a fingerspelling game, so you do need to know the ABCs before this Meetup, but that's it. We will go through introductions and some topics that might come up in conversations when you first meet someone, such as:

1) Are you hearing or Deaf?

2) Are you taking ASL classes?

3) What's your teacher's name and is she/he Deaf?

4) Where are you from/where do you live?

5) Why do you want to learn ASL?

6) Are you single or married?

7) Do you have children?

 

Yes ... small talk and chit chat! Come and practice! Come one, come all!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a bunch of people signing!
item.name: ASL SOCIAL-BEGINNERS
